remarks: ` F ` expressed as a finite product.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
etransclem4.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ CC ) $.
etransclem4.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. NN ) $.
etransclem4.M $e |- ( ph -> M e. NN0 ) $.
etransclem4.f $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> ( ( x ^ ( P - 1 ) ) x. prod_ j e. ( 1 ... M ) ( ( x - j ) ^ P ) ) ) $.
etransclem4.h $e |- H = ( j e. ( 0 ... M ) |-> ( x e. A |-> ( ( x - j ) ^ if ( j = 0 , ( P - 1 ) , P ) ) ) ) $.
etransclem4.e $e |- E = ( x e. A |-> prod_ j e. ( 0 ... M ) ( ( H ` j ) ` x ) ) $.
etransclem4 $p |- ( ph -> F = E ) $.
$d A j x $.
$d M j $.
$d P j $.
$d j ph x $.
